sentences.en: 30 percent of reptiles, birds, and fish are currently threatened with extinction.
sentences.cn: 目前，30%的爬行动物、鸟类和鱼类面临灭绝的危险。

sentences.en: All water used by the fire - brigade for fire extinction purpose is supplied free by an act of Congress.
sentences.cn: 根据议会的法案,消防队用于灭火的水全部免费供应.

sentences.en: An operation is beginning to try to save a species of crocodile from extinction.
sentences.cn: 一项行动正在展开来拯救一个鳄鱼种类使其免遭灭绝。

sentences.en: At only slightly lower pressure levels " low pressure extinction " will occur.
sentences.cn: 只要压力稍微降低一些,就将发生 “ 低压熄灭 ”.

sentences.en: Conservationists are trying to save the whale from extinction.
sentences.cn: 生态环境保护工作者正努力挽救鲸类以防止其灭绝。

sentences.en: Hundreds of tree species face extinction.
sentences.cn: 许许多多树种濒临灭绝。

sentences.en: In the 19th century, inbreeding nearly led to the extinction of the royal family.
sentences.cn: 19世纪，近亲婚配几乎导致皇室宗族灭绝。

sentences.en: Many species are in peril of extinction because of our destruction of their natural habitat.
sentences.cn: 许多物种由于我们破坏了它们的自然环境,现在正面临灭绝的危险.

sentences.en: Many species have been shot to the verge of extinction.
sentences.cn: 很多物种已经被猎杀到灭绝的边缘。

sentences.en: One of the most important causes of extinction is loss of habitat.
sentences.cn: 灭绝的最重要原因之一就是生活环境的丢失.

sentences.en: species in danger of extinction
sentences.cn: 有灭绝危险的物种

sentences.en: That'small " emotion, love, grows amazingly when threatened with extinction.
sentences.cn: 爱情这个 “ 小小的 ” 情感碰到毁灭的威胁时,就会长得惊人地快.

sentences.en: The animals were ruthlessly hunted to the verge of extinction.
sentences.cn: 这些动物由于遭到无情的捕猎而濒于灭绝.

sentences.en: The centuries-old ritual seems headed for extinction.
sentences.cn: 延续了几个世纪的仪式似乎要面临消亡。

sentences.en: The loggers say their jobs are faced with extinction because of declining timber sales.
sentences.cn: 伐木工人说由于木材销量下降，他们的工作恐不复存在。

sentences.en: The plant is now in danger of extinction.
sentences.cn: 这种植物现在有绝种的危险.

sentences.en: Their traditional way of life seems doomed to extinction.
sentences.cn: 他们的传统生活方式似乎注定要消亡。

sentences.en: They have driven the rhino to the edge of extinction.
sentences.cn: 他们已经令犀牛濒临灭绝。

sentences.en: They were hunted almost to extinction.
sentences.cn: 它们遭受猎杀，几近灭绝。

sentences.en: We shall simply be resigning ourselves to extinction unless we carry on the four modernizations.
sentences.cn: 如果不搞四个现代化,我们就只有束手待毙.

trans.tran_en: when a particular type of animal or plant stops existing
